opinion.posture: Indictment charging defendant with operating a motor vehicle while under the influence of intoxicating liquor. Before STRANAHAN, P.J. Appeal, No. 265, April T., 1972, from order of Court of Common Pleas of Mercer County, Sept. T., 1971, No. 111. Argued April 10, 1973.
opinion.attorneys: Robert F. Banks, First Assistant District Attorney, with him Samuel J. Orr, IV, Assistant District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellant; Anna BelleJones, with her Stranahan Stranahan, for appellee.
